类 darks.log.LoggerBuffer
的使用

使用 LoggerBuffer 的软件包
darks.log   
 

darks.log 中 LoggerBuffer 的使用
 

返回 LoggerBuffer 的 darks.log 中的方法
 LoggerBuffer Logger.append()
          Append log message by string buffer.
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(boolean b)
           
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(char c)
           
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(char[] str)
           
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(char[] str, int offset, int len)

 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(java.lang.CharSequence s, int start, int end)
           
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(double d)
           
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(float f)
           
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(int i)
           
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(long lng)
           
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(java.lang.Object obj)
           
 LoggerBuffer Logger.append(java.lang.Object msg)
          Append log message by string buffer.
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(java.lang.String str)
           
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.append(java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
           
 LoggerBuffer Logger.buffer(java.lang.Object... msgs)
          Buffer log message string.
 LoggerBuffer LoggerBuffer.format(java.lang.String format, java.lang.Object... objs)
          Format log message by pattern.
 LoggerBuffer Logger.format(java.lang.String format, java.lang.Object... objs)
          Format log message by pattern.
